All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractState
This state stores FSM it belongs to.
Consumer<T>
Functional interface that represents an operation that accepts a single input argument and returns no result.
DaemonThreadFactory
Creates daemon threads.
DirectExecutor
Executes tasks in the current thread.
Event
The event of very loose structure.
Example
Example of usage JPinboard.
FiniteStateMachine
Finite State Machine base implementation.
The finite state machine is not thread-safe by its nature.
FiniteStateMachineTest
 
FirmataDevice
Implements IODevice that is using Firmata protocol.
FirmataDeviceTest
 
FirmataEventType
Contains constants for protocol message types and payload parts.
FirmataI2CDevice
Represents an I2C device and encapsulates communication logic using Firmata protocol.
FirmataMessageFactory
This class contains methods that help to build command messages for Firmata device.
FirmataParser
Parses byte-stream of Firmata messages.
FirmataParserTest
 
FirmataPin
This class contains implementation of Firmata pin.
FirmataToken
This class contains set of constants that represent tokens of Firmata protocol.
In addition it contains headers and keys of events that occur when Firmata messages are received.
FirmataWatchdog
Implementation of low-level event hadler that supposed to be used as a watchdog.
I2CDevice
Represents an I2C device and encapsulates logic to communicate to it.
I2CEvent
This event occurs when I2C device transmits some data.
I2CExample
Example of usage of an i2c device.
I2CListener
Describes processing of data received from I2CDevice.
IODevice
This interface describes a device which is able to receive and transmit signals.
IODeviceEventListener
This interface describes an object that can receive and handle events from an IODevice.
IOEvent
An event which indicates that the state of an IODevice changed.
JPin
Displays representation of a Pin.
Currently it supports displaying of pins in Pin.Mode.INPUT, Pin.Mode.OUTPUT and Pin.Mode.ANALOG modes as well as disabled pins, i.e., pins without supported modes.
JPinboard
Displays pins states of IODevice.
JSerialCommTransport
Implementation of TransportInterface based on SerialPort.
JSSCTransport
Transfers data via serial port using jssc library.
MonochromeCanvas
This is monochrome 1-bit-per-pixel canvas that allows to draw basic graphical shapes, characters, strings and bitmaps.
It was inspired by Adafruit GFX library.
MonochromeCanvas.Color
 
NetworkTransport
Allows connections over the network.
OnMessageReceiveListener
Handles events of receiving a message.
OnPinChangeListener
Handles events of a pin change.
OnStartListener
Handles events when IODevice starts.
OnStopListener
Handles events when IODevice stops.
Parser
Processes byte-stream by the rules of underlying protocol.
ParsingAnalogMappingState
This state parses analog mapping message and fires an event that contains information about how the analog ports match to the pin indexes.
After receiving the last byte, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
ParsingAnalogMessageState
This state parses the analog message that points an analog input has changed.
The analog message consists of three bytes: first contains four bits of a command and four bits with port id; second and third contains current value of port.
After receiving the last byte, the state fires an event to FSM and transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
ParsingCapabilityResponseState
This state parses capability response and fires an event that contains information about pins and their supported modes.
After receiving the last byte, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
ParsingCustomSysexMessageState
This state collects raw binary data until it receives SYSEX_END message and publishes it as a SYSEX_CUSTOM_MESSAGE event.
ParsingDigitalMessageState
This state parses digital message and fires an event that contains information about the state of each pin of the port where state of at least one pin has changed.
After receiving the last byte, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
When digital input of particular pin has been changed, Firmata transmits state of whole port the pin is contained in.
A port is a set of 8 pins.
ParsingExtendedAnalogMessageState
This state parses extended analog state message and fires an event that contains information about the state of an analog input where the state has changed.
This kind of message is received when pin id of the analog input is greater than 15 and/or value on the input is greater than 16383.
After receiving the last byte of the message, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
ParsingFirmwareMessageState
This state parses firmware message and fires an event that contains the name and version of firmware.
After receiving the last byte of the message, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
ParsingI2CMessageState
This class parses inbound I2C messages and publishes them when they are complete.
ParsingStringMessageState
 
ParsingSysexMessageState
This state parses type of sysex message and transfers FSM to the state which is able to handle the message.
If the state receives unknown type of sysex message, it transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
ParsingVersionMessageState
This state parses version report message that contains the version of the protocol the hardware supports.
Pin
A pin is a connector of an IODevice to external signal receiver or transmitter.
Pin.Mode
Mode represents particular duty of a pin.
PinEventListener
The listener interface for receiving events from Pin.
PinStateParsingState
This state parses the pin state message.
After receiving the last byte of the message, the state transfers FSM to WaitingForMessageState.
SerialPortList
 
SerialTransport
Transfers data over the serial interface.
SSD1306
This class provides facilities to control a monochrome OLED display on SSD1306 driver.
SSD1306.Size
 
SSD1306.VCC
 
SSD1306MessageFactory
This class contains methods that help to build command messages for SSD1306 device.
SSD1306MessageFactory.MemoryAddressingMode
 
SSD1306MessageFactory.ScrollDirection
 
SSD1306Token
This class contains set of constants that represent tokens of SSD1306 device protocol (commands and control bytes).
State
The interface of the state of the FiniteStateMachine.
TransportInterface
Interface to abstract the device connection (serial/network) to a device.
WaitingForMessageState
This is initial default state of FirmataDevice.
The state is waiting for command and determines to which state transfers to parse further data.
